code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useAuth}from'../context/AuthContext';import MedicineCard from'../components/MedicineCard';import StockAlerts from'../components/StockAlerts';import Loader from'../components/Loader';import PageTransition from'../components/PageTransition';import'./Medicines.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Medicines=()=>{const{medicines,getStockAlerts,fetchMedicines}=useAuth();const alerts=getStockAlerts();const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const loadData=async()=>{setLoading(true);await fetchMedicines();setTimeout(()=>setLoading(false),1200);};loadData();},[]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Loader,{});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PageTransition,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"medicines-page",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"page-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Our Medicines"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Browse our complete selection of quality medications"})]}),alerts.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StockAlerts,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"medicines-grid",children:medicines.map(medicine=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MedicineCard,{medicine:medicine},medicine.id))})]})})});};export default Medicines;
